definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Errors are easily made that prevent the trial balance from balancing.
sentences.chinese: 致使试算表不平衡的错误是很容易犯的。

sentences.english: Yes, I know most of the word processing. presentation, spreadsheet program.
sentences.chinese: 我知道大部分文字处理，简报，试算表程序。

sentences.english: The trial balance can make the preparation of financial statements easier.
sentences.chinese: 试算表可以使财务报表的编制更加容易。

sentences.english: Previously, this information was sent manually via spreadsheets.
sentences.chinese: 此前，这方面的资料，被送往手动经试算表。

sentences.english: Equality of totals in the debit and credit sides of an account.
sentences.chinese: 对借方余额和贷方余额是否相等的验证就叫做试算表。

sentences.english: The preparation of a trial balance can not prove that transactions have been correctly recorded in the proper accounts.
sentences.chinese: 试算表不能证明经济业务已被正确地记入适当的账户。

sentences.english: The trial balance is a useful accounting device despite its limitations.
sentences.chinese: 试算表尽管有其局限性，但仍然是种有用的会计工具。

sentences.english: View the result set for the most recently executed Select query in a spreadsheet-like grid.
sentences.chinese: 检视类似试算表的方格中最近执行选取查询的结果集。

sentences.english: The preparation of the adjusted trial balance is a very useful step in the accounting cycle.
sentences.chinese: 编制调整后试算表是会计循环中非常有用的一个环节。

sentences.english: To see how well it really works, I have given Spreadsheet Convertor a test.
sentences.chinese: 以了解其真正的作品，我已试算表转换器进行测试。

sentences.english: Fourth, prepare an adjusted trial balance.
sentences.chinese: 第四，编制调整后试算表。

sentences.english: Prepare the trial balance to make sure that debits equal credit;
sentences.chinese: 准备试算表，确保借贷相等。

sentences.english: Assist the Asst. Financial Controller to prepare Financial Statement and Trial Balance.
sentences.chinese: 协助财务经理准备财务报告及试算表。

sentences.english: An empty spreadsheet contains a two-dimensional grid of cells.
sentences.chinese: 一个空的试算表包含二维的格子。

sentences.english: This proof of equality of debit and credit balances is called a trial balance.
sentences.chinese: 对借方余额和贷方余额是否相等的验证就叫做试算表。

definition: per book/as recorded in the accounts
(accounting) to strike a balance/to reverse an entry/to write off
